product_name: Rossignol Trixie Pro Skis - Girl's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A lightweight twin-tip for future freestylers, the Rossignol Trixie Pro skis let young girls have a blast making their way down the mountain or exploring the terrain park. Please note that these skis do not include bindings with purchase. Poplar wood core creates a light and lively ski with excellent ski-to-snow feel and high durability, and fiberglass laminates create a fun, lively feel that enhances pop. Cap construction strengthens the top and sidewalls of the Rossignol Trixie Pro skis. Rounded tip shape is designed specifically for park and pipe transitions and skiing switch; a shock-absorbent rubber insert enhances durability and reduces impacts. Directional twin-tip profile excels when going forward and lets her land jumps and ride backward. Base or topsheet color may vary from online photo. Closeout.
short_description: A lightweight twin-tip for future freestylers, the Rossignol Trixie Pro skis let young girls have a blast making their way down the mountain or exploring the terrain park.
